name: Bmelgren - Tonic
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=2.000000
fDecay=0.980000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.100899
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500000
nVideoEchoOrientation=3
nWaveMode=0
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=0
bTexWrap=0
bDarkenCenter=1
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=1
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=100.000000
fWaveScale=2.656359
fWaveSmoothing=0.000000
fWaveParam=-0.380000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=1.000000
fZoomExponent=1.691364
fShader=0.000000
zoom=0.869900
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=1.000000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.000000
wave_g=0.000000
wave_b=0.000000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.005000
ob_r=0.000000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.235000
ib_r=0.500000
ib_g=0.500000
ib_b=0.500000
ib_a=0.100000
nMotionVectorsX=2.399999
nMotionVectorsY=48.000000
mv_l=5.000000
mv_r=1.000000
mv_g=0.000000
mv_b=0.000000
mv_a=0.600000
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + treb*.5;
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + mid*.5;
per_frame_4=dx = dx - .001;
per_frame_5=dy = dy - .001;
per_frame_6=rot = rot-sin(time)*sin(.05*mid_att)*mid;
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom-max(.25,(bass-1.2))*cos(time*1.4+rad*(bass*(bass*5)));
